biotools.summary: The AstraZeneca PheWAS Portal is a public repository of gene-phenotype associations. These data were generated using exome sequencing and phenotype data from the UK Biobank accessed as part of application 26041. The AstraZeneca PheWAS Portal uses reference genome GRCh38.

bioschemas.name: AstraZeneca PheWAS Portal
